## hpr1411 :: ohmroep live 1, 31-06-2013, pirate parties

 
Nido Media reporting Live from OHM2013 in the Netherlands. He is joined
by a group of Pirate Party members including Fabricio Martins do Canto,
Dirk Poot, Jonas Degrave, Thomas Gordon. They discuss how their pirate
party chapters were started, how to start your own. What it means to be
a pirate party, the goals of pirate parties. Later we are joined by
Christopher Clay who tells us about the situation over there.
